comments.body: I think this change makes sense, though I must admit that I'll miss typing "ick" when I need to craft sticks followed by a pickaxe, since both contain "ick". ⛏️

Se comparar o tamanho do braço do player na 1 pessoa e menor na versão bedrock comparado com a versão Java, além disso deveria ser possível colocar os itens que são possíveis colocar na segunda mão na versão Java já que na bedrock somos limitados a totens e escudos
I think the recipe book option should already be enabled because many players who are not aware of the novelty could create worlds without first activating the recipe unlocking

I wish it was possible to search for main articles with the magnifying glass, similar to the Java edition, where the player can search for "#flowers" and see all the flowers that can be collected in the creative

1. I do like the change with the first words only being searchable but for Waxed Lightly Weathered Cut Copper Stairs I feel like only the ‘Copper’ and ‘Stairs’ words should be searchable. Since this would be a pain to implement I will say I don’t believe that the change will affect that many blocks so it’s fine either way. Overall it is easier to find things.

2. I feel like when searching it should only show the recipes you unlocked. If I have specifically have the toggle enabled then I feel like I should only have the recipes I unlocked in search. Turning the toggle off allows players in existing worlds to not have to deal with not knowing recipes or being able to easily craft anything. It would also prevent new players from accidentally getting overwhelmed my new blocks. I also think it should be enabled by default to prevent this issue for new players.
Make a recipe book a loot.

To get parity, just because of limitations in Java, there is no need to make Bedrock worse, which is quite a lot in 1.20.2x, it can update java to bring into line with bedrock for some. On these questions...
Do players feel they can find the recipes they are searching for?
Yes, there is a huge community of minecraft players with a large majority still in the early stages of spelling. Typing Tor, and seeing Comparator is not a bad thing, if I type Compari I would end up with zero results because I spelt the search incorrectly. Members young and old benefit from the currently excellent search. Mojang provides updates to minecraft to add extra items, the exposure to these items is enhanced when you can actually see all items, and increase the exposure. 
Do players get overwhelmed with too many options rather than finding the ones they were searching for?
Not at all, with nearly all items the old method of searching allows a unique way to find items, with very few search terms will you actually find the search overwhelmed, the new method would be a regression.

I'd like to at least see a toggle between "Match Beginning of Word" and "Match All", as an option. If you wanted to search for red and have Redstone items appear, it wouldn't show Block of Redstone, since it doesn't start with red.

To answer your two questions:

  • Do players feel they can find the recipes they are searching for?

Yes. I personally can find what I want quite easily with the current search. It will be a bit of a learning curve to change to search only the beginning of a word. 

  • Do players get overwhelmed with too many options rather than finding the ones they were searching for?

I don't, however I definitely feel like my children get overwhelmed when they can't find something specific. My older kids have learned to type in a specific part of a word. This is the reason I personally like to have the ability to search using any part of the word, not just the beginning. Typing on PC is easier to search, however  when I'm on my phone, I would prefer to search within the entire name, rather than just the beginning, as I can quickly type a few letters as a shortcut to what I want to have appear. 

Typingin WOL gets me the wolf spawn egg. I really don't want to type SPAWN WO and have to manage my way around all those extra characters (especially on a phone/tablet)

I think it should be a togglable option when searching sometimes you need to look by groups Copper & Wax Copper and rarely are you in a rush to look up a recipe so a more in-depth interface(s) would be handy.

It would also be handy to toggle on/off having the recipe book fully unlock at the start of the world, which would help with custom recipes added in by data packs. Or making it so data pack recipes are automatically unlocked in the recipe book would be a significant improvement.

Otherwise, a UI recipe book for all work blocks would be handy to see their inputs and outputs with some basic info. For brewing a strict unlock step for each potion would be cool.

I like all the changes especially the searching one
But I think showing recipes players havent unlocked yet kinda cancels the whole idea of recipe book.
It's better to be identical to java editing in this.
Dont like it rather have it like before so you can see all the stuff

This is awful.

Where did the idea that players are overwhelmed by the number of options come from? I've never heard this from anyone I know. This is like going back to the 1990s search functionality, when we had to use wild cards. It was novel then and but makes no sense now.

As for searching only unlocked items...whats the point? All of the recipes and items are documented on the internet, so why make someone leave the game to find it, or find out how to unlock it?

I do not like this at all, the recipe book being search only should be an option, this sucks because I really liked it when it was actually organized. But, to be completely honest, I do not know if this is an option, please tell me if it is an option, because I really need it organized.
I never liked the search option, it was absolutely useless unless you couldn't find something. I would rather the search option get removed than the actual ORGANIZED stuff. I needed that a lot

Recipe unlocking is becoming frustrating to turn off in Bedrock as it is a lot of pops in each new world.
The new search doesn’t take kids into consideration at all.
If wanting to find a comparator, typing tor was very useful to my child in survival mode.
The old search was fine, did not overload players and actually showed new items that should be built or investigated. The new search doesn’t cater to the majority of Minecraft players, put politely the old search was better for those who could not spell.
It is a degredation.
The old search system was good. I definitely prefer it more. It helped you find an item if you didn't remember its name.
you should be able to go in chat or leave while going through a nether or end portal
Hope you have good luck

I understand that that message is supposed to be annoying to push players to use encrypted verified chat. But come on! I am renting a server and even I cant figure out a way to stop it from server side so please make that pop-up a toggleable "feature".
please
That would be extremely helpful, or. If tabbing in/out of Minecraft, during it's reload when refreshing the window. It would reload Resource-Packs.
Considering that Java does has this  (F3 + T), Bedrock is in dire need for this feature.
plsss
I think that this would be a good addition to both version but maybe make it so that in order to blink you need to edit your character
basically words that might be considered innapropriate if they were taken out of context.

i cant type in the name "Tolenspire" because its been deemed "offensive"  it's literally a name for a structure I CREATED and it wont let me name my realm that.  maybe if Microsoft wasn't run by monkeys with typewriters we wouldn't have these stupid issues.

Microsoft needs to stop thinking every phrase is a bad phrase, and get their mind out of the gutter.  i couldnt type, "RIP William Tinkle-bottom, ride free my valiant steed" because bottom and ride were in succession with eachother.  its dumb
Small change but would love to see this, considering it’s a cross-platform where you can use a variety controllers. Hopefully it wouldn’t be too inconvenient to implement!

Булоб добре змінить керування на подібне до ігор: Pubg mobile, Cal of duty mobile та інші, мені дуже не вистачаєкругового курка для руху та окремих кнопок на зруйнування блоку і встановлення блоку, було б добре змінювать положення кнопок на екрані під тригера,тоді це була б для мене ідеальна гра на телефоні.
Надіюсь мене хтось прочитає і почує дякую
It should be like first person shooter games the customization.
I think also seeing their inventory in survival would be great as well, especially for food farms
this needs to be added

I would agree on a custom mob setting. It would make it more interesting.

(just my thought) but if you open cheats before or after you make your world you can just optimize how you want your mobs to do or don't.
I REALLY want them to do this!!
Love this idea!!!!
It would be nice to make changes to mobs but they can be scary to little children that join your server

I agree with the idea of an armor toggle, though I would want it to affect all players view so my friends and I can all see each others skins while we play. This would be super nice since you pay for special skins just to have them covered up by basic armor.

I think this would be such a great edition to the game. i want to stop hearing my nether portal constantly, but if i turn off the blocks sound, it turns off all the sounds that come from blocks when i just want to mute the portal. maybe there could just be a sub-section next to each sound slider in the sounds menu.

I would definitely love to see more control over the sounds.  I play with headphones and I have to keep all volumes down between 1 & 15 percent.  There are still ear drum busting sounds despite my volume settings.  I extend this further by using resource packs that further lower the volumes of many things but it is still not enough.

I like to stream while playing and this is also annoying to my viewers.

 

Submenu for every sound file in game with both a mute toggle and volume adjustment would be a tremendous addition to the game and extremely well received.

i have pyrophobia and the sounds is more of a trigger than the look. im useless in the nether since i have various mental problems and the sound causes my hands to start twitching and i cant stop shaking. but i mute blocks and cant hear the sounds that i want to hear. i want to mute the stupid crackly red things all over the ground
Yes please, it is jarring
Like a switch in settings menu, turning to the lowest possible graphic settings, dimming brightness, and disabling vibrate

Moved to proper category.

Clarified subject to help search results.

Thanks for your contribution.

10+ stacks...

Finger spasm

Moved to proper category.

Thanks for your contribution.
Just what I was looking for! I definitely want this to be added, It will just make it look way cleaner.
Please do this, Minecraft Earth already supports this

They could probably use an image of a dirt block as the background and the Minecraft logo as the foreground since in order to make an adaptive icon you have to have a background and a foreground so they technically only need to do the coding work for it
May servver is error
I agree I have 103 worlds and I did the math since it takes about ten minutes to delete a world it would take 16 hours to delete 100 worlds plz do this mojang and Microsoft
I think that's a good idea because I have got 102 worlds!
I need a search bar for world names because i can't find my favorite world
I agree I have 200 plus worlds and it is a nightmare to find the right one and it would take hours to delete the ones I don't need
Something MCPE needs which is so logical lol
I did thought about this too while crafting concrete and coarse dirt it was a lot of clicking action XD
Yes pleeeeaaaasssse add this, it’s so frustrating clicking so many times

I came to share the same idea.
Recently I was playing Minecraft with Cube³ texture and I saw a crafting button in the craft menu. I thought Mojang had added, but no. I remove the texture and the craft button vanish :-/

Yea, I have the same problem, there's a good thinking behind the idea of the narrator, but it keeps annoying me, because I switch the camera with b, so everytime I sneak and want to look around me the narrator turns on :|
This is true.
Yes, I would love this! It would be especially useful when playing against PC or console players, who are pretty much OP in every other aspect, PC especially.
Agree, its slow on mobile, and it would also let you aim while firing
They are already doing this. It's one of the functions of the teams that will come some time after the scoreboard command (which's gonna be releasing in 1.7)
It reminds me of the suggested mapmaker’s dimension.  I think it would be a good idea for creative, not survival.
I believe the reason why it's not in the game (alongside the version selector present on the java launcher) has to do with a limitation on the windows store side. Might be wrong

It is very difficult on large tablets (9.7"), but my Presbyopia makes smaller screens uncomfortable to use.

 

I'm okay with the button above or below the "jump" button.  It should be placed opposite the movement buttons.
IDK if that's as easy as it sounds, maybe i'm wrong, that would just be more information retrieved from your Microsoft Account and a longer sign-in process
